name: Notion (npx)
description: Read and write Notion pages, databases, and blocks locally via npx. Uses a Notion integration token for authentication.

inputs.label: Notion Integration Token
inputs.description: Internal integration secret token from Notion. Share the relevant pages/databases with your integration after creating it.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to notion.so/profile/integrations
2. Click 'New integration'
3. Give it a name and select your workspace
4. Copy the Internal Integration Secret (starts with ntn_)
5. Share desired pages/databases with the integration

auth.instructions: Create an integration at notion.so/profile/integrations and share pages with it
